data: Rebekka Kaleja

Recently when I upload videos it just isn't uploading them. I still get the video on my phone so i know i uploaded it but when I check it's not there. This happened to me 3 times in the last week And i always have to find the Sound again then add the saved video and then post it again because it's also not available in my drafts anymore. Edit: the response worked and after the next update the issue was completely gone

Hi, sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please provide the issue details within the TikTok app via the following steps: 1) Go to your profile page 2) Tap on the button on the top right corner 3) Choose "Report a Problem" on the "Privacy and Settings" page. Thanks, TikTok team

I wish I could stop the live feeds from showing up. I also wish there was a way to exclude sponsored videos (not ads, I don't mind an occasional ad, but actual posts by other people that are sponsored are way too frequent.)

Cute and fun, it seems like when i start watching these, i fall down a rabbit hole & lose all track of time, the doggone things are ADDICTIVE! The Beverly Halls, the Beestrom family (w/the little girls "eyeboos" is hysterical) and Sebastian w/his "the scary thing about..." vids....i could go on & on...but instead I'll finish this up by saying TikTok you've come a long way from just silly dance videos!! Rock on!!!

Its awesome. It's a bit annoying that a don't get the exact videos that i want on my for you page but i suppose it's supposed to work like that.😃 The suggested search is annoying and I really wish there was a little tab to pull on so you could quickly get to the bottom of your favorites. It's a geeat app though.

Hi, thanks for choosing TikTok, your feed is personalized to you based on the videos you liked in the past. Be sure to like videos to see more similar ones and long tap Not interested that you don't want to see in your feed, which will quickly influence your feed with the stuff you want to see!
